Parameters.name: target
Parameters.description: The identifier of the database to retrieve the entity from.

Returns.description: A list of strings containing database identifiers associated with the provided target.

conv.Docstring:
Calls `getCompleteEntity` and retrieves the database identifier for a specific CheBI entry based on the given database target.

Parameters:
-----------
chebiId : str
    A valid ChEBI identifier.
target : str
    The database target to retrieve identifiers from.

Returns:
--------
list
    The relevant database identifiers based on the target provided.

Examples:
--------
>>> ch.conv("CHEBI:10102", "KEGG COMPOUND accession")
['C07484']

Parameters.name: relationshipType
Parameters.description: One of "is a", "has part", "has role", "is conjugate base of", "is conjugate acid of", "is tautomer of", "is enantiomer of", "has functional parent", "has parent hybride", "is substituent group of".

Parameters.name: onlyWithChemicalStructure
Parameters.description: If True, restrict results to entities with chemical structure information.

Returns.description: A list (<class 'suds.sudsobject.LiteEntityList'>, treat it like a list of nested named tuples) of ontology children of the given entity based on the specified criteria.

getAllOntologyChildrenInPath.Docstring:
Retrieves the ontology children of an entity including the specified relationship type.

Parameters:
-----------
chebiId : str
          A valid ChEBI identifier string.
relationshipType : str
          Specifies the type of relationship to consider when retrieving children. Supported values include "is a", "has part", "has role", "is conjugate base of", "is conjugate acid of", "is tautomer of", "is enantiomer of", "has functional parent", "has parent hybride", "is substituent group of".
onlyWithChemicalStructure : bool, optional, default False
          If True, restrict results to entities with chemical structure information.

Returns:
--------
suds.sudsobject.LiteEntityList
    A list of ontology children of the given entity based on the specified criteria.

Examples:
--------
>>> ch.getAllOntologyChildrenInPath("CHEBI:27732", "has part")

Parameters.name: chebiId
Parameters.description: A valid ChEBI identifier as a string.

Returns.description: A list (<class 'suds.sudsobject.Entity'>, treat it like a nested named tuple) containing fields like mass, names, and SMILES.

getCompleteEntity.Docstring:
"""
Retrieves the complete entity including synonyms, database links, and chemical structures, using the ChEBI identifier.

Parameters:
-----------
chebiId : str
          A valid ChEBI identifier as a string.

Returns:
--------
suds.sudsobject.Entity
    An object containing fields like mass, names, and SMILES.

Examples:
--------
>>> from bioservices import *
>>> ch = ChEBI()
>>> res = ch.getCompleteEntity("CHEBI:27732")
>>> res.mass
194.19076
"""

Parameters.name: chebiIdList
Parameters.description: List of ChEBI accession numbers to retrieve, maximum size is 50.

Returns.description: Result list of suds.sudsobject.Entity (<class 'suds.sudsobject.Entity'>, treat it like a nested named tuple) containing complete entity information corresponding to the provided ChEBI accession numbers.

getCompleteEntityByList.Docstring:
Retrieve the complete entities for a list of ChEBI accession numbers.

Parameters:
-----------
chebiIdList : list
             List of ChEBI accession numbers to retrieve, maximum size is 50.

Returns:
--------
list[suds.sudsobject.Entity]
    Result object containing complete entity information corresponding to the provided ChEBI accession numbers.

Examples:
--------
>>> from bioservices import *
>>> ch = ChEBI()
>>> res = ch.getCompleteEntityByList(["CHEBI:27732"])
>>> res[0].mass
194.19076

Parameters.name: searchCategory
Parameters.description: Filter with category such as ALL, SMILES, etc.

Parameters.name: maximumResults
Parameters.description: Maximum number of results to retrieve, default is 200.

Parameters.name: stars
Parameters.description: Filter by stars: TWO ONLY, ALL, THREE ONLY.

Returns.description: List of suds.sudsobject.LiteEntity (<class 'suds.sudsobject.LiteEntity'>, treat it like a nested named tuple) representing ChEBI entities matching the criteria.

getLiteEntity.Docstring:
Retrieves a list of entities containing the ChEBI ASCII name or identifier.

Parameters:
-----------
search : str
    Search string or category.
searchCategory : str, optional
    Filter with category such as ALL, SMILES, etc. Default is 'ALL'.
maximumResults : int, optional
    Maximum number of results to retrieve. Default is 200.
stars : str, optional
    Filter by stars: TWO ONLY, ALL, THREE ONLY. Default is 'ALL'.

Returns:
--------
list
    List of objects representing ChEBI entities matching the criteria.

Examples:
---------
>>> ch.getLiteEntity("CHEBI:27732")
>>> ch.getLiteEntity("caffeine")
>>> ch.getLiteEntity("caffeine", maximumResults=10)

Returns.description: suds.sudsobject.OntologyDataItemList (<class 'suds.sudsobject.OntologyDataItemList'>, treat it like a nested named tuples) representing the ontology children of the specified entity.

getOntologyChildren.Docstring:
Retrieves the ontology children of an entity, including relationship type.

Parameters:
-----------
chebiId : str
    A valid ChEBI identifier.

Returns:
--------
suds.sudsobject.OntologyDataItemList
    An object representing the ontology children of the specified entity.

Examples:
--------
>>> ch.getOntologyChildren("CHEBI:27732")

Returns.description: suds.sudsobject.OntologyDataItemList (<class 'suds.sudsobject.OntologyDataItemList'>, treat it like a list of nested named tuples) representing the parent entities in the ontology.

getOntologyParents.Docstring:
Retrieves the ontology parents of an entity including the relationship type.

Parameters:
-----------
chebiId : str
    A valid ChEBI identifier, e.g., 'CHEBI:27732'.

Returns:
--------
suds.sudsobject.OntologyDataItemList
    An object representing the parent entities in the ontology.

Examples:
--------
>>> ch.getOntologyParents("CHEBI:27732")

Parameters.name: chebiId
Parameters.description: A valid ChEBI identifier in string format.

Returns.description: suds.sudsobject.UpdatedPolymer (<class 'suds.sudsobject.UpdatedPolymer'>, treat it like a nested named tuple) containing updated polymer information, including 2D MolFile structure, formula, charge on repeating units, and a primary ID.

getUpdatedPolymer.Docstring:
Returns the UpdatedPolymer object containing comprehensive information regarding a polymer in the ChEBI database.

Parameters:
-----------
chebiId : str
           A valid ChEBI identifier representing the polymer.

Returns:
--------
UpdatedPolymer
    An object with details such as 2D structure, global formula, global charge, and associated identifiers.

Examples:
--------
>>> ch = ChEBI()
>>> polymer_info = ch.getUpdatedPolymer("CHEBI:12345")
